comment_content: Climate change will increase the difference between have/have nots. We have to get a lot better at recycling. There is a lot of talk about recycling, but very little do
We have to re-use or breakdown what we have used. You cannot keep producing. You will run out.
Apart from the 10c plastic bottle refund, that we are paying for anyhow, there is no drive or incentive to re-use, re-purpose,re-design
This is one the biggest crises facing us, and we are not devoting any energy, resources or intellect towards solving this issue
We must elevate this. It is a key part of saving our world
